enhanced_by.reason: The calculate method performs similar validation checks on the input code length before proceeding with the check digit calculation, which can be used to set up the test environment for the isValid method.
The isValid method delegates to ISBN10_CHECK_DIGIT.isValid for ISBN-10 codes, making it a direct source for assertions about the isValid method's behavior for ISBN-10 codes.
The isValid method delegates to ISBN13_CHECK_DIGIT.isValid for ISBN-13 codes, making it a direct source for assertions about the isValid method's behavior for ISBN-13 codes.
